meanings.definition: Opposed to or against Black people or Black culture.
meanings.sent1: The antiblack remarks made by the speaker were hurtful.
meanings.sent2: Her antiblack attitude was evident in her discriminatory actions.
meanings.sent3: The antiblack cat refused to play with the black cat.
meanings.sent4: The stormy sky seemed to wear an antiblack cloak of prejudice.
meanings.sent5: The antiblack graffiti on the wall was a stark reminder of hatred.

meanings.definition: Showing hostility or prejudice towards Black individuals or communities.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's antiblack behavior towards the student was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: The antiblack policies of the company led to protests.
meanings.sent3: The antiblack snowman refused to melt next to the black snowman.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with an uncomfortable, antiblack tension.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes held an unmistakable, antiblack glare of prejudice.
